UniprotID	Q16667
Accession	Q16667;Q53ZU6;Q5U0M4;Q6P1N8;Q99585;Q9BPW7;Q9BY36;Q9C042;Q9C046;Q9C047;Q9C049;Q9C051;Q9C053
EntryName	CDKN3_HUMAN
ProteinName	Cyclin-dependent kinase inhibitor 3 (EC 3.1.3.16) (EC 3.1.3.48) (CDK2-associated dual-specificity phosphatase) (Cyclin-dependent kinase interactor 1) (Cyclin-dependent kinase-interacting protein 2) (Kinase-associated phosphatase)
GeneName	CDKN3 CDI1 CIP2 KAP
Length	212
Function	May play a role in cell cycle regulation. Dual specificity CC phosphatase active toward substrates containing either phosphotyrosine or phosphoserine residues (PubMed:8127873, PubMed:8242750). Dephosphorylates CDK2 at 'Thr-160' in a cyclin-dependent manner (PubMed:7569954).
Subcellular Location	Cytoplasm; Perinuclear region
